title: Bike Bright
category: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Google api, node
body: Bike Bright was a collaborative effort between myself and three others over two weeks at Code Fellows. It is a single page web app that allows the user to get in touch with the Portland community to find up date bicycle parking and locations of bicycle theft.

title: Discover Portland
body: Discover Portland was my first collaborative project at Code Fellows. It allows the user to get updated information on activities to do in the area based on their lifestyle choices.
